attributes.action: Corporate entities do not ignore rights of citizens impacted by developments
attributes.additional_details:
This petition sets out the position of two citizens of the UK and their family whose expectations of the UK judicial system to uphold and protect their rights in a fair and impartial court have not been upheld.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBwa_BAii9UyMr-9_lM6MEw?view_as=subscriber
attributes.background: Here our story on what Corporations have done to my families lawful rights and how they were taken away from us.
